Content: **FroZen Clan -  NAE_ NAW_ EU**NLNL➢ **General Info**NLWe are an all around clan_ and are very versatile with our selection of recruits.NLNL➢ **Pro Players (Competitive)**NLIn order to compete in events_ we need the best of the best to play for our team.NLNL➢ **Snipers (Casual)**NLWe need people who can hit consistent clips to give to our editors for montages.NLNL➢ **GFX and Editors**NL Editors and GFX designers are needed to make thumbnails_ montages_ edits and logos for the team.NLNL➢ **Content Creators**NLWe are in need of players who will be able to make content for the official FroZen Clan channel.NLNL➢ **Sponsorships**NLWe are currently supported by Rogue Energy. Use Code FROZENCLAN to save 10%!NLNL**Other Requirements**:NL➟ You must be able to make a #FroZenRC video.NL➟ You must be at least 13 years of age. NL➟ You must be active (In Discord & in game)NL➟ You must be able to use the in game VC AND Discord VCNL➟ You must speak fluent English.NL➟ You must be loyal to the clan.NL➟ You have to be able to learn from your mistakes and your clips.NL➟ There is absolutely no being in other clans at the same time.NLNLNL**DM me for more information!**
